channel.title: How do you set stats and prices for an item?
channel.description: Hi I have been adding shops latley to my server but I don't know how to set stats and prices for buying/selling the item. can you write the layout of how it should look and what file I out the code in. Thankyou

item.title: How do you set stats and prices for an item?
item.dc:creator: @geo_dude geo dude
item.description:
@geo_dude wrote:

God Of Legend:

k thx[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 18, 2008, 04:54:06 PM[/size][hr]does adjusting the stats make weapon hit higher or do you have to do that somewhere else?

it does make you hit higher if you add on to the strength

Read full topic
item.source: How do you set stats and prices for an item?

item.title: How do you set stats and prices for an item?
item.dc:creator: @Tyrael Tyrael
item.description:
@Tyrael wrote:

The 1st 3 numbers are prices for shops, low alch, high alch.

The next 12 are as follows

Offensive: stab, slash, crush magic, range.
Defensive: stab slash crush magic range
The last two are Strength Prayer.
-tyrael-

Read full topic
item.source: How do you set stats and prices for an item?

item.title: How do you set stats and prices for an item?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

item.cfg

item = 4151 Abyssal_whip A_weapon_from_the_abyss. 4000000 4000000 4000000 0 102 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 52 0

the first 3 numbers are prices
the rest are bonuses
idk what each one is atm srry

Read full topic
item.source: How do you set stats and prices for an item?

item.title: How do you set stats and prices for an item?
item.dc:creator: @Moptop Moptop
item.description:
@Moptop wrote:

Its in your item.cfg. I will use some random item for example-

item = 3232323 Item_name Item_description Price Price Price Stat Stat Stat Stat Stat Stat Stat Stat Stat Stat Stat Stat

The stats are in the order they appear on a client’s stat bonuses page. Top to bottom.

Read full topic
item.source: How do you set stats and prices for an item?
